author: kevaundray
content:
Left some changes!

Some things to note:

- You may find it hard to swerve from short weierstrass curves to edwards curves
- It might make sense to make a distinction between groups written in additive notation versus group using the addition operation which _should_ be written in additive notation (research papers usually use multiplicative notation)
- It might be more correct to state that we use pedersen hashes and not pedersen commitments

author: jefferson8477
content: Thxs for the feedback, will work on it!
